title: Baltimore Ravens’ Outbreak Forces Third Postponement
sub_head: The Ravens were supposed to play the Pittsburgh Steelers on Thanksgiving but the game is now scheduled for Wednesday in a disruption that lays bare the turbulence the NFL will face
body:
A sustained coronavirus outbreak inside the Baltimore Ravens has forced a third postponement of the team’s game against the Pittsburgh Steelers, laying bare the difficulties the NFL faces as it tries to finish its season.
The Ravens-Steelers game was supposed to be the highlight of the NFL’s Thanksgiving calendar. Over the course of several days, it has turned into a problem threatening to blow up the NFL’s carefully plotted schedule. The Ravens have registered new Covid-19 positives every day for over a week, first pushing...
